page.title: 02St.Davids Library
page.content: St.Davids library is by the city hall.Mrs.Hughes works in the library.The library is open on Tuesdays,from ten till twelve thirty,and three till six in the afternoon.It is also open on Fridays,the times being ten till one,and two till five.The books are sorted in alphabetical order.There are Welsh,junior,fiction and non-fiction books there which are written by famous authors such as Enid Blyton,Agatha Christie,Nevil Shute and many others.Alot of pupils from Ysgol Dewi Sant take books out for projects.Mrs. Hughes would like more people to use the library,especially children.
